FuncDef: The TCP/IP traceroute utility determines the route to a destination address. Note that aborting a traceroute with the<Ctrl-C>command could require issuing a second<Ctrl-C>command before the prompt is returned.
CLIs: traceroute { <ip-address> | <dns-name> } [ ttl <ttl> ] [ wait <milliseconds> ] [ no-dns ] [ source <ip-address> ] [ tos <type-of-service> ] [ router <router-instance> | service-name <service-name> ] [ detail ]

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the remote address to traceroute. The IP address or the DNS name (if DNS name resolution is configured) can be specified. Values-ipv4-address|a.b.c.d|, ipv6-address |x:x:x:x:x:x:x:x[-interface]x:x:x:x:x:x:d.d.d.d[-interface]|x:   [0 to FFFF]Hd:   [0 to 255]D, dns-name |63 characters maximum|.
Specifies the maximum time-to-live (TTL) value to include in the traceroute request, expressed as a decimal integer. Values-1 to 255. ParamDefault: Default- 30 hops
Specifies the time in milliseconds to wait for a response to a probe, expressed as a decimal integer. Values-10 to 60000. ParamDefault: Default- 5000 milliseconds
Specifies that a DNS lookup for the specified host name will not be performed. ParamDefault: Default- DNS lookups are performed

Specifies the source IP address to use as the source of the probe packets in dotted decimal notation. If the IP address is not one of the device s interfaces, an error is returned. Values-ipv4-address|a.b.c.d|, ipv6-address |x:x:x:x:x:x:x:x (eight 16-bit pieces)x:x:x:x:x:x:d.d.d.d|x:   [0 to FFFF]Hd:   [0 to 255]D.
Specifies the type-of-service (TOS) bits in the IP header of the probe packets, expressed as a decimal integer. Values-0 to 255. ParamDefault: Default- 0

Specifies the router name, CPM router instance, or service ID. Values-router-instance : router-name or service-id, |router-name|Base, management, cpm-vr-name, vpls-management, |cpm-vr-name|[32 characters maximum], |vprn-service-id|1 to 2147483647. ParamDefault: Default- Base
Specifies the service name up to 64 characters in length.
Displays MPLS label stack information (if available).
